meanings.definition: The quality or state of being grotesque.
meanings.sent1: The grotesqueness of the monster in the movie scared me.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the grotesqueness of the creature in his painting.
meanings.sent3: The exaggerated features of the cartoon character added a touch of grotesqueness to the show.
meanings.sent4: The twisted branches of the old tree had a certain grotesqueness to them.
meanings.sent5: The grotesqueness of the Halloween decorations made the house stand out on the block.

meanings.definition: The quality of being distorted or unnatural in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The grotesqueness of the mask made it perfect for the costume party.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting captured the grotesqueness of the distorted figure.
meanings.sent3: The exaggerated features of the toy added a touch of grotesqueness to the playroom.
meanings.sent4: The shadows cast by the streetlights created a sense of grotesqueness in the alley.
meanings.sent5: The grotesqueness of the old building made it a popular spot for urban explorers.
